task_units.name: View route map or schedule
sub_actions: CLICK on destinations or schedules link
CLICK on specific route or timetable link

task_units.name: Search for train tickets
sub_actions: CLICK on search or find trains button

task_units.name: Filter search results
sub_actions: SELECT filter criteria (e.g., time of day, train type)

task_units.name: Select train and seating preferences
sub_actions: SELECT seating preferences (e.g., forward facing, window)
CLICK on continue or confirm button

task_units.name: Add to cart or proceed to booking
sub_actions: CLICK on add to cart or book button
CLICK on continue to payment or checkout button

task_units.name: Apply discounts or railcards
sub_actions: CLICK on add railcard or discount option
CLICK on done or apply button

task_units.name: Request vacation package quote
sub_actions: CLICK on deals or vacation packages link
CLICK on submit quote request button

task_units.name: View job openings
sub_actions: CLICK on search or view jobs button

task_units.name: View terms and conditions
sub_actions: CLICK on deals or specific service link
CLICK on terms and conditions link
